Detailed Description

System main loop for AVR portation.

Date:
2007-Dez-11
Author:
S. Rohdemann, S. Radtke (C) 2007 Nanotron Technologies
Note:
BuildNumber = "BuildNumber : 7951";

This file contains the source code for the system main loop that controls the nanoLOC devkit board.
